name: Magnet (Alpha)
description:
A unique game where you play as a living magnet.  After beating the game, please don't click off this site just yet. Test out endless mode, where you go endlessly and collect 'Magnetiums' while being chased by the explorer.

The controls are simple. Click on the metal blocks to move.

This game is still in early development, any feedback would be appreciated. This game is uploaded for feedback. Please tell me how this game could be improved on.

Made in GDevelop.
